'''Piping-Hot Oncidium Tofu''' is a Quest Item obtained during the "[[Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course: Part I]]" Event [[World Quest]]. Three copies of this item will automatically be added into the player's [[inventory]] and will then be given to [[Cloud Retainer]].
